comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110818 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110818040253

Steps to reproduce:

Many words are not accepted by the dictionaries used by Firefox. Words like LOL,woot ,facebook,google,firefox( :O ) etc must be there in the dictionaries. Many more are listed somewhere here http://blog.oup.com/2011/08/concise/
comments.author: divjot94@gmail.com
